posts.post_title: t206 LOT of 43 cards for Sale!  Mostly SGC
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason
I would like to sell them in one lot for $1600.   
43 T206 cards= 32 SGC, 6 raws, 5 other graded companies
I have them in scan.  Please let me know if you would like to see them.
I will accept Paypal, money order or check.
